name: ASP .Net viewstate decoder / encoder +
short_description: viewstate is a decoder and encoder for ASP .Net viewstate data. It supports the different viewstate data formats and can extract viewstate data direct from web pages. viewstate will also show any hash applied to the viewstate data.
